abstract: Kalu Uche (born 15 November 1982) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays for Al Rayyan in the Qatar Stars League, as a forward or an attacking midfielder.He spent most of his professional career in Spain, mainly with Almería, with which he amassed La Liga totals of 117 games and 27 goals.A Nigerian international in the 2000s, Uche represented his country at the 2010 World Cup.
